      • init

        public void init()
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 EventException,
                 java.lang.InterruptedException,
                 SerializationException,
                 HashException,
                 HashTopologyException,
                 PartitionerException,
                 FileSystemException
        Begins Server execution. This method attempts to fail fast to provide immediate feedback to wrapper scripts or other user interface tools. Only once all the prerequisite components are initialized and in a sane state will the StorageNode begin accepting connections.
        Specified by:

        public void handleStorageRequest(StorageRequest request,
                        EventContext context)
                          throws HashException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 PartitionException
        Handles a storage request from a client. This involves determining where the data belongs via a Partitioner implementation and then forwarding the data on to its destination.

        HashException
